comments:
Set to use an external Ant install and do not remove the Xerces libraries.

Investigate if recent regression...move to RC1 if not.

The problem was that the AntClassLoader was the context classloader when the 
PDE plugin was loading it XML parsing classes.

Changed so that the AntClassLoader is removed from the picture when loading 
classes from plugins.

Changes to AntClassLoader and AntModel
*** Bug 99489 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
